Once again, I'm asking for opinions (this time based of a suggestion) 
on the tournament issues by taking a poll.

> Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
> gladiator group:
> 
> Which is more important in a Gladiator 
> tournament? 
> 
>   o time 
>   o integrity 
> 
> 
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/gladiator/polls
